name: Dice in the Wall
description:
You are a die that must rotate and switch lanes to match and/or avoid the upcoming obstacles. NOTE: You get bonus points for matching obstacles. The die face that is facing towards you must correspond to the obstacle numbers you are colliding with. 

Controls:

  • WASD to rotate die
  • QE to switch lanes

Mismatching will cost you 1 heart. The walls however will instantly cost you 3 hearts.

Make sure to enter a name for the leaderboard and compete against your friends.
